title: NIT Karnataka Jobs 2026 - Apply Online for Civil Engineer Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology Karnataka (NIT Karnataka) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Civil Engineer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the NIT Karnataka Jobs 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, ...
